synopsis.text:
Monogatari follows Homura Akemi, a magical girl, as she navigates a world that seems too good to be true. While her friends in Mitakihara live peaceful lives, occasionally battling evil, Homura can't shake the feeling that something is amiss. In this world, someone who shouldn't exist is present, and Homura is determined to uncover the truth behind the mysterious circumstances.

Madoka Kaname, once an ordinary girl, sacrificed her very existence to free all magical girls from a cruel destiny. However, Homura, unable to keep her promise to Madoka, continues to fight in the world Madoka left behind. Haunted by memories of her friend, Homura is driven by the hope of seeing Madoka's smile again.

As Homura delves deeper into the mystery, she grapples with the 'Law of Cycles' that guides the magical girls towards an uncertain fate. In this new world shaped by Madoka's sacrifice, will the magical girls find hope or despair? Join Homura in her desperate and selfish struggle to uncover the painful truth in this poignant conclusion to the tale of five magical girls.
